channel.title: Motorshield on Mobile Robot I/O
channel.description: Recent content in Motorshield on Mobile Robot I/O

item.title: Inexpensive Motor Controllers for Arduino and Raspberry Pi
item.description: Whenever started to build a mobile robot and first started this project I set out to pick up motor controller and a platform to buildMy Tom’s vehicle around. The two most on his choices at least to me were a Raspberry Pie or an Arduino. As I found out selecting either platform I choose it would have been a bad idea, and here is why.
